name: Mashed Potatoes
description: Follow these easy steps to make the smoothest, fluffiest, cloud-like mashed potatoes you've ever had! Plus ideas for more flavor add-ins.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp salt (to salt the boiling water) ($0.02)

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and dice the potatoes into 1-inch cubes. Place the diced potatoes in a colander and rinse well with cool water to remove the excess starch.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel and dice the potatoes into 1-inch cubes. Place the diced potatoes in a colander and rinse well with cool water to remove the excess starch.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rinsed potatoes in a pot and add fresh water until the potatoes are covered by one inch. Add ½ tsp salt to the water in the pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the rinsed potatoes in a pot and add fresh water until the potatoes are covered by one inch. Add ½ tsp salt to the water in the pot.

recipeInstructions.text: Place a lid on the pot and bring the water up to a boil. Boil the potatoes for 6-7 minutes, or until they are very tender (a fork can pierce the potato effortlessly).
recipeInstructions.name: Place a lid on the pot and bring the water up to a boil. Boil the potatoes for 6-7 minutes, or until they are very tender (a fork can pierce the potato effortlessly).

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the potatoes in a colander and rinse again briefly with warm water.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the potatoes in a colander and rinse again briefly with warm water.

recipeInstructions.text: While the potatoes are draining, add the butter and milk to the pot used to boil the potatoes. Heat them over medium until the butter has melted.
recipeInstructions.name: While the potatoes are draining, add the butter and milk to the pot used to boil the potatoes. Heat them over medium until the butter has melted.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the drained potatoes back to the pot and mash with a potato masher.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the drained potatoes back to the pot and mash with a potato masher.

recipeInstructions.text: Season the potatoes with salt and pepper (I used ½ tsp salt and ¼ tsp pepper, but if you use unsalted butter you'll probably want more salt).
recipeInstructions.name: Season the potatoes with salt and pepper (I used ½ tsp salt and ¼ tsp pepper, but if you use unsalted butter you'll probably want more salt).

recipeInstructions.text: For extra smooth and fluffy mashed potatoes, use a hand mixer to whip the potatoes until there are no lumps and they are light and cloud-like. Serve and enjoy!
